title: One Night Stand with a Billionaire
description: Eighteen-year-old Kaley Evansville finds herself in a pickle when her younger brother gets diagnosed with leukemia. Withoutliving parents to help them out, Kaley must find a way to keep whatever is left of her family intact.So, when billionaire CEO Blake Blackburn makes an offer to help her, she is left with no choice but to accept. A one-night stand with a billionaire in exchange for money seems simple enough, but sometimes we get more than we bargained for.Soon, their entanglement turns into something more . . . but both of them still have their own demons that they must face.Will this twisted affair be their salvation? Or will it ruin their chances of creating a lifelong bond?
author: Ayla D. Viktoreva
